post_text:
Everyone talking about TRM and it is definitely interesting. Thoughts:
1) disappointing that it doesn't scale up
2) still needs plenty of FLOPs
3) would be cool to project into LLM embed space
4) unclear how it could be generalized
5) feels either foundational or dead-end

Less is More: Recursive Reasoning with Tiny Networks
Alexia Jolicoeur-Martineau (Samsung SAIL) introduces the Tiny Recursive Model (TRM). Just 7M parameters, yet achieves:
45% test accuracy on ARC-AGI-1
8% on ARC-AGI-2
Outperforming many LLMs with <0.01% of their size.

この生物学的に着想を得た手法は、数独、迷路、ARC-AGIなどの難しいパズルタスクにおいて、小さなデータ（約1000例）で小さなモデル（27Mパラメータ）で訓練された大規模言語モデル（LLM）を凌駕する。
